nodes.text: A therii was a creature that could be found on the planet Batuu. Elee was a therii that was the pet of Black Spire Outpost resident Salju.

The therii was introduced in the children's book Elee & Me, written by Amy Ratcliffe and published in 2020. As Elee reminded Ratcliffe of a woolly mammoth, she based the name therii on a mammoth binomial name.

The species itself was created for an unbuilt third attraction for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge often informally referred to as "the Bantha ride", where guests could ride a full-sized animatronic Elee around Black Spire Outpost, a concept which was eventually dropped for budgetary reasons.
